name: TheLostElection
description:
(NEW UPDATE PATCH NOTES)

-updated Donald trump figure

-added secret ending

- added new level

-updated Biden

-Donald trump now does follow you

-updated terrain graphics

-added settings and pause menu in-game

-Donald trump now has an animated walk

-fixed bug where Donald trump randomly walks off

-Donald trump now talks

this is probably the last update it will receive hope you guys enjoy and I really made this for a joke I may put it on the android store this is all free so hope you enjoy
